translations: [光] 复消色差的；高度消色的

sentences.sentence: Apochromatic correction using AD elements. Mostly used on tele primes and zooms.
sentences.translation: 减低色差。主要用于远程素及缩放。

sentences.sentence: Optical design of apochromatic objective used wave disparity method in this paper.
sentences.translation: 采用波差法进行复消色物镜的光学设计。

sentences.sentence: In the same way, we can design the apochromatic photograph objective by different glasses.
sentences.translation: 同理，选取不同的玻璃组合，也能设计出高质量的复消色摄影物镜。
